summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Deepfake Image Detection System. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly. Model loaded successfully, predictions working with proper confidence scores, UI responsive with real-time updates.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/model-status returns correct status (model loaded)
Backend API /api/predict accepts images and returns valid predictions (REAL/FAKE with confidence)
Backend API /api/predictions returns prediction history correctly
Backend API /api/stats returns accurate statistics (total, fake count, real count)
Backend properly handles invalid file uploads with appropriate error responses
Frontend UI loads with all components (hero section, upload area, statistics, model status)
Frontend image upload functionality works correctly
Frontend displays prediction results with proper labels, confidence scores, and progress bars
Frontend statistics update in real-time after predictions
Frontend prediction history updates in sidebar
Frontend model status badge shows 'Loaded' in green
Frontend file validation rejects non-image files properly
Frontend reset functionality clears results and returns to upload state
End-to-end integration: upload → predict → display → update stats/history flow works seamlessly

success_percentage.integration: 100% (seamless data flow between frontend and backend)
